caption.p: IOE relieves the histopathological changes in myocardial tissue. Representative hematoxylin and eosin staining images of myocardial slices at ×200 magnification (upper panel; scale bar, 50 µm) and ×400 magnification (lower panel; scale bar, 25 µm). n=4. IOE, Inonotus obliquus extract; MI/R, myocardial ischemia/reperfusion.
